document.full_text: libyan deputy foreign minister abdelati obeidi told greek prime minister george papandreou on sunday that libya wants to end fighting in the country, greek officials said.
document.title: libya wants end of fighting: libyan envoy
lines_and_colors: libyan deputy foreign minister abdelati obeidi told greek prime minister george papandreou on sunday that libya wants to end fighting in the country, greek officials said.
